price: И дошле су им вести у којима је оно што треба да их одврати од неверства
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزۡدَجَرٌ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad jāahum mina al-anbāi mā fīhi muz'dajarun
